Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Health and Social Care NHS Foundation Trust. Works with people from black and minority ethnic (BME) communities to improve their access to mental health services and help provide a culturally competent response to needs of service users and carers. Covers the African Caribbean, Irish, Pakistani, Somali and Yemeni communities as well as other BME communities. Works citywide and has links with community groups, voluntary and faith organisations. The team may be contacted directly for advice and information and follows the required code for confidentiality.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 3rd Mon in the month 12noon-1.30pm (transcultural interest group)
